title: #113: The Left's Coming for Your Guns and Meat, Illegal Immigration Insanity, And More Leftist Meltdowns
text: Matt and Storm are back after the Labor Day weekend, and they have a lot to discuss. There was another mass shooting over the holiday weekend, and like clockwork, the Left is looking to push gun control while several questions still need answering. They also talk about the latest news regarding illegal immigration, as Joe Biden makes an insane illegal immigration proposal and Montgomery County Maryland sees more illegal immigrants commit heinous and disturbing crimes. Mat and Storm also cover some of the latest Lefty meltdowns, from MAGA hats causing panic attacks to another public university targeting Chick-Fil-A.
description: Matt and Storm are back after the Labor Day weekend,
